comment.body:
I tested it and but it doesn't work. If you just click around on the website aternos.org/servers/ it works totally fine, 
![Unbenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106693139/224860340-2fb9df7a-49b8-4a09-b7ea-e4133cf481ee.PNG)

but if you're clicking on 'your own server' -button you'll will be redirected to aternos.org/server/ (the 's' is missing now in the url) and then the Adguard filter doesn't work there anymore.
![Unbwenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106693139/224860250-2b26e6a1-2c8d-46a4-85ca-20bb0fa85036.PNG)

:wave: @zloyden. Note that this link may also use `/fr/` _(my case :relaxed:)_ or `/en/` instead of `/nl/` — depending on the [language chosen](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224859048-43476bd2-72cf-4e69-b956-26ded6765a53.png) by the user. :wink: Thank you in advance for the slight update! :v:

Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://translate.yandex.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. При блокировке рекламы на сайте, блок рекламы исчезает, но структура сайта нарушается. Основные фреймы не по центру и аватарка сдвинута вправо.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Выглядит вот так:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010703](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704144-69c4a9ab-ea65-48ed-a119-c9ddef23af59.png)
</details>



<details><summary>Должно быть:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010733](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704300-f77151a4-20d2-4128-98b8-fd16d4df0297.png)
</details>





### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

Desktop

_No response_
